attributes.action: make Harrogate, North Yorkshire, the Capital of the United Kingdom. Also move the Houses of Parliament to the Stray stone by stone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that the Capital is moved to Harrogate in order to create a more central society. As it is we would have to travel to London in order to lobby our complaints to our MPs and Government. I would not wish to change the actual building where Parliament sits as it holds so much historical importance to the ruling of Britain. It should be moved and rebuilt in Harrogate.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
